info.name: *Latest* NexHealth Synchronizer API v20240412
info.description: **Synchronizer API by NexHealth: The Universal Dental PMS Integration Layer** Synchronizer API connects to most dental Practice Management Systems (PMS), including Dentrix, Eaglesoft, Open Dental, Denticon and more, through a single, secure API built for real-time healthcare workflows. Designed for developers building healthcare integrations and interoperability tools, Synchronizer simplifies cross-system data exchange for patients, appointments, payments, and communication while maintaining HIPAA compliance. [Start in Sandbox](https://developers.nexhealth.com/signup)**:** To get started while maintaining SOC 2 compliance, obtain API keys and run sample test calls. **Capabilities** Receive instant notifications for key events across connected systems. - Real-Time Webhooks - Patient creation, updates, and balance changes - Appointment booking, modifications, and cancellations - Treatment plan updates - Payment transactions and ledger adjustments **Developer Tools** Everything you need to build, test, and debug integrations quickly. - Full Postman collection with authenticated examples - Self-service API keys and token-based authentication (1-hour bearer tokens - Sandbox environment populated with demo PMS data - Real-time request validation and webhook error responses - Transparent versioning and deprecation model for backward compatibility **Performance & Scale** Built for reliability at healthcare scale. - Up to 100 requests per second - 1,000 requests per minute (core endpoints) - 2,000 requests per minute (non-core endpoints) - Millions of daily API calls supported across multi-tenant systems - 99.9% uptime SLA with active monitoring and retries **Data Domains:** Synchronizer unifies the data model across multiple PMS schemas. - **Patients**: demographics, balances, insurance, and contact data - **Appointments**: availability, booking, and asynchronous scheduling - **Providers and Locations**: schedules, operatories, and multi-site management - **Payments**: transactions, ledgers, and adjustments - **Treatment Plans**: webhook-driven updates **Getting Started** - [Start in Sandbox](https://developers.nexhealth.com/signup) **–** Test live API calls against a preconfigured environment that mirrors production. Includes mock PMS data, and full endpoint coverage. - [Quickstart on GitHub](https://github.com/synchronizer-api/quickstart) **–** Clone the Quickstart repo to launch a working integration in under 10 minutes. Includes environment variables, authentication examples, webhooks and more. - [Video Walkthrough](https://www.loom.com/share/e541491c076c4003b61528b052e3c96f) **–** Step through the entire setup process, auth setup, test calls, webhook validation, and common troubleshooting. **Quick links** - [Authentication](https://docs.nexhealth.com/v20240412/reference/authentication-1) **→** how to obtain and use sandbox keys - [Patients](https://docs.nexhealth.com/v20240412/reference/patients-1) **→** create/read/update - [Appointments](https://docs.nexhealth.com/v20240412/reference/appointments-1) **→** availability & booking - [Webhooks](https://docs.nexhealth.com/v20240412/reference/webhook-subscriptions) **→** events and retries **Full docs:** [https://docs.nexhealth.com/v20240412/reference/introduction](https://docs.nexhealth.com/v20240412/reference/introduction) **Core Endpoints** **Patients:** Create and retrieve patient objects with demographics, insurance, and balance data synchronized across PMS systems. Supports real-time balance lookup, patient ID matching, and merge resolution. - Endpoints: GET, POST /patients - Supports real-time balance retrieval and cross-PMS identity resolution - Ideal for sync engines, patient portals, and data onboarding flows **Appointments:** Book, update, and manage appointments with full availability and scheduling sync. Manage scheduling, availability, and rescheduling logic across providers and operatories. Supports asynchronous creation and webhook-based confirmation events. - Endpoints: GET, POST, PATCH /appointments - Supports async creation with webhook confirmation events - Includes provider and operatory availability across multi-location practices **Webhooks:** Subscribe to structured event payloads for patient updates, appointment status changes, payments, and digital-form completions. Includes signed delivery, retries, and replay control. - Endpoints: POST /webhooks - Events include patient updates, appointment changes, payment processing, and patient updates - Includes retry logic, event signatures, and replay handling **Payments:** Record and reconcile transactions, charges, and adjustments across PMS ledgers. Enables automated ledger sync and error-tolerant posting for revenue analytics. - Endpoints: GET, POST /payments, /adjustments; GET /charges - Supports real-time ledger synchronization - Used in analytics, billing integrations, and revenue dashboards **Providers & Locations:** Query and access provider details, working hours, and operator assignments with support for multi-location practices. - Endpoints: GET /providers, GET /locations - Ideal for scheduling and resource management systems ** Quickstart Repo:** [Synchronizer on GitHub](https://github.com/nexhealth/synchronizer) **Need support?** Email [developers@nexhealth.com](https://mailto:developers@nexhealth.com) Synchronizer API by NexHealth. The universal integration layer for connected dental PMS systems
